name: TMNT: Mutant Madness
description:
Join the legendary Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles in TMNT: Mutant Madness!

The dimensions are collapsing and only the Turtles can stop the chaos. Team up with the brothers Leonardo, Raphael, Michelangelo and Donatello on a totally awesome new adventure. Gather your allies (and your enemies) in a fight to save the world!



*Collect*
Gather and train allies from the TMNT universe to create a radical squad of your favorite characters. Use your squad to battle and complete quests to earn bodacious rewards!

*Build*
Take control of the Turtle Lair! Unlock and upgrade new rooms to help your heroes. Earn resources even while offline!

*Battle*
Complete quests to earn epic rewards! Take your squad into adventure mode and fight against classic villains like Shredder, Krang, and more! Challenge other players' squads in Dimensional PVP battles!

*Level Up*
Outfit the Turtles with special attacks & powerful skills to take on hordes of Foot Clan ninjas from across the multiverse!

Cowabunga, dudes!
